subject: Boxing
Families and Family Life
Retirement
lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather Sr., who nurtured his son’s career but is now estranged from him, will attend his son’s fight courtesy of tickets from his opponent, Oscar De La Hoya.
snippet: Floyd Mayweather Sr., who nurtured his son’s career but is now estranged from him, will attend his son’s fight courtesy of tickets from his opponent, Oscar De La Hoya.
